thread.title: Police call for more resources and new systems to fight terrorism
thread.title_full: Police call for more resources and new systems to fight terrorism - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Police call for more resources and new systems to fight terrorism
text: The Police Federation of Australia is warning today that there is no consistent approach to terrorism across the country and that governments need to invest more to improve police systems. At a meeting in Adelaide today, police unions have called for a new national criminal intelligence system and a national case management system that would allow all eight police forces to access cross-border information. ...
